helloXYZ.script: var data = Math.floor((Math.random() * 10) + 1) ; var ret = data > 5? "hello" : "world";var error, value = { observedState: ret, rawData: {message: options.requiredProperties.test1, random: data}}; send(null, value);

metadata.author: WWW Pizurica
metadata.description: Test script, pushing back the required properties as the raw result
